Staff, very rare (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
Carved from a single piece of solid crystal, this staff has numerous reflective facets that produce a strangely hypnotic effect. The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LWTUqKkUQdMAmOe0]{color spray} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPconfoundsenses]{confound senses} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd]{hypnotic pattern} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPjeweledfissure]{jeweled fissure} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPprismaticray00]{prismatic ray} (5 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eGMhwmuleAM46C6L]{prismatic spray} (7 charges).
The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the crystal shatters, destroying the staff and dealing 2d6 piercing damage to each creature within 10 feet of it.
